<S%H6258>"Now<s%> let them <S%H7368>put<s%> <S%H7368>away<s%> their <S%H2184>harlotry<s%> and the <S%H6297>corpses<s%> of their <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from Me; and I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

<S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H1004>house:<s%> its <S%H3605>entire<s%> <S%H1366>area<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> [shall be] <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H428>'These<s%> are the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> for the <S%H4196>altar<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> it is <S%H6213>built,<s%> to <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> on it and to <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> on it.

'And on the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering;<s%> and they shall <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> as they <S%H2398>cleansed<s%> [it] with the <S%H6499>bull.<s%>
